coded_answer.p: During my last holiday in London, I was visitingvisited your theatre in order to see "Over the rainbow". You wrote some things in your advertisement and I was disappointed that they wasn'tweren't true.

First you have written that the starringstars were Danny Brook and Tina Truelove, but the realactual actors were different. It was a disappointingdisappointment for me, because thisthese actors were recommended by my friend, because he knows Danny and Tina.

You have also written in your advertisement that it would startedstart at half past seven but it started at 20:15! So we had to wait more than a half hour. ItI wouldn't behave mindminded if the restaurant had pressed in order to eat or drink something, but it was closed, and it hadn'tdidn't alsoalso it didn't openedopen after the show, because the waitress had to clean up the theatre room.
Over theseAlso thethere tickets were notno discountwere no discount tickets available as you havehad written there were in your advertisement.
So it wasn't a perfect evening for me and I think about it, if I can have my money back. If it's possible, please write back.

Sara was a very good puplepupil. She didn't learnstudy a lot but she knew all the important things. She was a very nice person and she helped alwaysalways helped if somebody needneeded her help.
